data.text: At AMEN MUSIC, we strive to bring a new sound to the worship music genre. We specialize in both English and Latin worship music, and with the help of our sub-label AMEN Musica, we are able to offer a diverse selection of music from different countries and cultures. Our label includes some of today’s top worship artists including Dante Bowe, Nate Diaz, Aaron Moses and Tianna. Our goal is to create music that will bring people closer to the Lord, and make them feel uplifted and inspired.
